chapter.text: 68|1|Nuna---sapatha kalamera [1] ebam tara ya lipibad'dha kare tara
68|2|Apanara rabera anugrahe apani unmada nana.
68|3|Ara niscaya apanara jan'ya rayeche nirabacchinna puraskara
68|4|ara niscaya apani mahana caritrera upara rayechena [1].
68|5|Atahpara acire'i apani dekhabena ebam tara'o dekhabe
68|6|tomadera madhye ke bikaragrasta [1].
68|7|Niscaya apanara raba samyaka abagata achena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini samyaka janena taderake, yara hidayataprapta.
68|8|Kaje'i apani mithyaropakaridera anugatya karabena na.
68|9|Tara kamana kare ye, apani aposakami hona, tahale tara'o aposakami habe
68|10|ara apani anugatya karabena na pratyeka emana byaktira ye adhika sapatha kari, lanchita
68|11|pichane nindakari, ye ekera katha an'yera kache lagiye beraya [1]
68|12|kalyanera kaje badha danakari, simalanghanakari, papistha
68|13|rurha sbabhaba [1] ebam tadupari kukhyata [2]
68|14|ejan'ye ye, se dhana-sampada o santana – santatite samrd'dhasali.
68|15|Yakhana tara kache amadera ayatasamuha tela'oyata kara haya takhana se bale, ‘e to purbabatidera kalpa-kahini matra.’
68|16|Amara abasya'i tara sumra dagiye deba.
68|17|Amara to taderake pariksa karechi [1], yebhabe pariksa karechilama udyana-adhipatiderake, yakhana tara sapatha karechila ye, tara pratyuse aharana karabe baganera phala
68|18|ebam tara ‘insa'allah’ baleni.
68|19|Atahpara apanara rabera kacha theke eka biparyaya hana dila se udyane, yakhana tara chila ghumanta.
68|20|Phale ta pure giye kalobarna dharana karala.
68|21|Pratyuse tara eke an'yake deke balala
68|22|‘tomara yadi phala aharana karate ca'o tabe sakala sakala tomadera bagane cala.’
68|23|Tarapara tara calala nimnasbare katha balate balate
68|24|‘aja sekhane yena tomadera kache kono misakina prabesa karate na pare.’
68|25|Ara tara nibrtta karate saksama ---- e bisbasa niye bagane yatra karala.
68|26|Atahpara tara yakhana baganera abastha dekhate pela, takhana balala, ‘niscaya amara patha hariye phelechi.’
68|27|‘Baram amara to bancita.’
68|28|Tadera srestha byakti balala, ‘ami ki tomaderake balini, ekhano tomara allahara pabitrata o mahima ghosana karachana kena?’
68|29|Tara balala ‘amara amadera rabera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karachi, amara to yalima chilama.”
68|30|Tarapara tara eke an'yera prati dosaropa karate lagala.
68|31|Tara balala, ‘haya, durbhoga amadera! Amara to chilama simalanghanakari.
68|32|Sambhabatah amadera raba e theke utkrstatara binimaya debena; niscaya amara amadera rabera abhimukhi halama.’
68|33|Sasti erupa'i haye thake ebam akhiratera sasti kathinatara. Yadi tara janata [1]
68|34|niscaya muttakidera jan'ya rayeche neyamatapurna jannata tadera rabera kache.
68|35|Tabe ki amara musalimaderake (anugataderake) aparadhidera samana ganya karaba
68|36|tomadera ki hayeche, tomara e kemana sid'dhanta diccha
68|37|tomadera kache ki kono kitaba ache yate tomara adhyayana kara
68|38|ye, niscaya tomadera jan'ya tate rayeche ya tomara pachanda kara
68|39|athaba tomadera ki amadera sathe kiyamata paryanta balabat emana kono angikara rayeche ye, tomara nijedera jan'ya ya sthira karabe ta'i pabe
68|40|apani taderake jijnesa karuna tadera madhye e dabira yim'madara ke
68|41|athaba tadera ki (allahara sathe) aneka sarika ache? Thakale tara tadera sarikaguloke upasthita karuka --- yadi tara satyabadi haya.
68|42|Smarana karuna, se dinera katha yedina payera gocha unmocita kara habe [1], sedina taderake daka habe sajada karara jan'ya, kintu tara saksama habe na
68|43|tadera drsti abanata, hinata taderake acchanna karabe athaca yakhana tara nirapada chila takhana to taderake daka hata sajada karate.
68|44|Ata'eba, chere dina amake ebam yara e banite mithyaropa kare taderake, amara taderake krame krame dharaba emanabhabe ye, tara janate parabe na.
68|45|Ara ami taderake samaya diye thaki, niscaya amara kausala atyanta balistha.
68|46|Apani ki tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, ta tadera kache durbaha danda mane haya
68|47|naki tadera kache gayebera jnana ache ye, tara ta likhe rakhe
68|48|ata'eba, apani dhairya dharana karuna apanara rabera nirdesera apeksaya, ara apani macha'oyalara n'yaya habena na, yakhana tini bisada acchanna abasthaya ahbana karechilena [1].
68|49|Yadi tara rabera anugraha tara kache na paumchata tabe tini lanchita abasthaya niksipta hatena unmukta praantare.
68|50|Atahpara tara raba take manonita kare take satkarmaparayanadera antarbhukta karalena.
68|51|Ara kaphirara yakhana kura'ana sone takhana tara yena tadera tiksna drsti dbara apanake achare phelabe ebam bale, ‘e to eka pagala.’
68|52|Athaca ta [1] to kebala srstikulera jan'ya upadesa.
